techs.name: Spell Books
techs.quote: 'The outcome of a magic duel doesn't depend on the spells you're using, but the way in which you are using them.' - Ekan Whithers

techs.name: Staffs and Wands
techs.quote: 'A staff is just a big wand, and a wand is just a small staff' - Arthur Dazenlin

techs.name: Magic Mastery
techs.quote: 'A strong warrior must me able to properly use their weapon, their staff, and their mind' - Prince Eliot Earthorn

techs.name: Religious Magic
techs.quote: 'Magic has many purposes, for fights, for fun, for good, and for evil' - Mikeal Victer
